title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height remains the same after modifying the label font size in the UI.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly when the label font size is modified in the UI.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the UI.
2. Select a label.
3. Modify the font size of the label.
4. Observe that the height of the label does not change.
